body:
http://www.ign.com/articles/2014/11/12/peta-is-launching-its-own-animal-utopia-server?watch
Come join the rest of the Internet in humiliating PETA!
Sorry, if you find that offensive, but PETA has gone crazy.

title: Are you looking for a server to grief?

replies.body: I don't run the server, I can't give you OP. But if I did.....I should be killed by the entire force of the Internet.
replies.body_tagged: I don't run the server, I can't give you OP. But if I did.....I should be killed by the entire force of the Internet.

replies.body: Basically, PETA, trying to save virtual animals, is making a utopia for animals. Why do it in Minecraft? Don't ask me.
replies.body_tagged: Basically, PETA, trying to save virtual animals, is making a utopia for animals. Why do it in Minecraft? Don't ask me.

replies.body: Well if QuollCraft is still up...
replies.body_tagged: Well if QuollCraft is still up...

replies.body: I'll bring my home boy xD
replies.body_tagged: I'll bring my home boy xD

replies.body:
This is a waste of money and is utterly stupid.

Personally, im gonna make a butcher skin and have crate fulls of meat. Their goal is misguided and really deluded.

"Even if animal tests produced a cure for AIDS, We’d be against it.”
-Ingrid Newkirk, Founder of PETA

Wow. This is... just wow... I can't even...

This is shameful and pathetic. They care more for animals than their fellow fully-sentient humans?
